description: Ultimate Automizer is a software model checker that implements an approach based on automata. It uses the Ultimate Automata Library (website available soon).

sections.title: web interface
sections.content: Ultimate Automizer is available via a web interface, in which you can verify C programs.

sections.title: commandline version
sections.content: A commandline version of Ultimate Automizer is available. This version runs on x86-64 linux machines and is our candiate for the SV-COMP 2015.

sections.title: commandline version SV-COMP
sections.content: With a preliminary version of Ultimate Automizer we participated in the SV-COMP 2013. We will also partipate in the SV-COMP 2014.

sections.title: publications
